results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows, arising in enumeration of catafusenes.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..20 of triangle, flattened
S. J. Cyvin, B. N. Cyvin, and J. Brunvoll, Unbranched catacondensed polygonal systems containing hexagons and tetragons, Croatica Chem. Acta, 69 (1996), 757-774; see Table III (p. 767).
formula: T(n, k) = (n-2)!/(k! * (n-k)!) * (9*n*(n-1) - 4*k*(3*n-k-2)) * 3^(k-2) for n >= max(k, 2) and k >= 0. (See the top formula of p. 767 in Cyvin et al. (1996).)
Bivariate g.f.: Sum_{n, k >= 0} T(n, k) * x^n * y^k = 1 + x * (1 + y) + x^2 * (1 + y)^2/(1 - x - 3 * x * y).
